name: [Prio] High
description: An urgent problem that blocks the system use until the issue is resolved.

name: [Prio] Medium
description: A core functionality is compromised. Workaround available.

name: [Prio] Low
description: Should be fixed if time permits but can be postponed.

name: [Sev] Critical
description: Mission-critical systems are not functioning correctly.

name: [Sev] High
description: Essential capability is affected. Workaround not available.

name: [Sev] Medium
description: Essential capability is affected. Workaround available.

name: [Res] Invalid
description: The issue as described is not actionable.

name: [Res] duplicate
description: Issue is a duplicate of an existing issue.

name: [Res] wonâ€™t do
description: The issue is marked resolved with no change.

name: [Type] Change Request
description: Some visible functionality should be change.

name: [Type] Maintenance
description: Cleanup or handling of technical debt.
